meanings.definition: A toxic alkaloid found in certain plants, such as potatoes and tomatoes.
meanings.sent1: Eating solanines from potatoes can make you sick.
meanings.sent2: Farmers need to be careful of solanines in their crops.
meanings.sent3: The solanines in the potatoes were up to no good!
meanings.sent4: The danger of solanines lurking in the tomatoes was like a hidden threat.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the harmful solanines in those plants!

meanings.definition: The plural form of solanine, referring to multiple toxic alkaloids found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: Scientists are studying the effects of various solanines on health.
meanings.sent2: The presence of solanines in the garden raised concerns.
meanings.sent3: The solanines in the plants seemed to be having a party!
meanings.sent4: The garden was a battlefield of different solanines fighting for dominance.
meanings.sent5: The multitude of solanines in the plants was overwhelming.
